column2: this last visit the quality of the cocktails and desserts was disappointing. The Shishito mojito seemed like mainly mixer
column3: and did not come with the pepper garnish as usual. Also
column4: we ordered the blueberry cake to go
column5: and it did not come with the earl grey ice cream. When I ordered the cake at the table
column6: the server even asked whether I wanted ice to keep the ice cream cold. I asked why there was no ice cream and was told that the to go order does not include it??
